#include <stdio.h>
#include <string.h>

int main()
{
    int testCases;
    char input[10001];
    char querie[10001];
    scanf("%i", &testCases);
	for(int t = 0; t < testCases; t++)
	{
        
        scanf("%s", input);
		int numQueries;
        scanf("%i", &numQueries);
		for(int q = 0; q < numQueries; q++)
		{
			int count = 0;
            scanf("%s", querie);
			char * found = strstr(input, querie);
            
			while(found != NULL)
			{
				count+=1;
				found = strstr(found+1, querie);
			}
			printf("%i\n", count);
		}
	}
}
